tool_description: Our API automates the addition of context-aware hyperlinks to markdown content. It's powered by AI that digs into your text to understand its context. Then, it smartly picks out and inserts relevant organic links. This means you get hyperlinks that are not only on-point but also blend naturally with your content, making it more useful and engaging. Plus, it's all automated, saving you the hassle of manual linking.
name: Hyperlink generator for Articles and Blogposts
title: Hyperlink generator for Articles and Blogposts
tool_name: Hyperlink generator for Articles and Blogposts

api_list.name: Ping
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hyperlink-generator-for-articles-and-blogposts.p.rapidapi.com/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hyperlink-generator-for-articles-and-blogposts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hyperlink-generator-for-articles-and-blogposts.p.rapidapi.com/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hyperlink-generator-for-articles-and-blogposts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
